Keys: Enemies dont show on the minimap when they fire their weapons Pay attention to your surroundings
Chinese (Simplified): 敌人开火时不会显示在小地图上。 注意你的周围！

Keys: Friendlies are only shown on the minimap at a close distance Officers must pay close attention to the ongoings on the battlefield
Chinese (Simplified): 只有近距离的友军才会显示在小地图上。 军官必须密切关注战场上的动态！

Keys: Your accuracy with firearms over long distances is reduced The distance at which you engage your enemy is vital to increase your success at hitting your target
Chinese (Simplified): 你的枪在长距离射击时精度会下降。你和敌人的交战距离对于增加你命中目标的成功率至关重要！

Keys: Your ammunition is limited Every shot counts
Chinese (Simplified): 你的弹药有限，记住你的射击次数！
